Up.Statement:
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM [dbo].[w2_ManagerListDispSetting] WHERE disp_colmun_name = 'scheduled_shipping_date' AND disp_setting_kbn = 'orderlist') BEGIN INSERT INTO [dbo].[w2_ManagerListDispSetting] VALUES ('0', 'orderlist','scheduled_shipping_date','0', ISNULL((SELECT MAX(disp_order)+1 FROM [dbo].[w2_ManagerListDispSetting] WHERE disp_setting_kbn = 'orderlist' AND disp_flag = '0'),1) ,140,'center',getdate(),'0000000001');
